Class SimpleRunningAverage

java.lang.Object
  freenet.support.math.SimpleRunningAverage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RunningAverage, Serializable
public class SimpleRunningAverage
extends Object
implements RunningAverage

Simple running average: linear mean of the last N reports.

amphibian
